name: Guitar Flame
description:
Guitar flame is a virtual guitar that challenged users to compete ability in playing the guitar. This game including 8 full songs instrument (update) where you can play as satisfied as possible. This game presents a graphical display as well as the strains of the song with clear quality. Enjoy the game, discover the thrill of playing in full songs instrument.

Features :
- 8 full songs instrument (update)
- Beautiful graphics and clear song
- Easy to control and user friendly
- Good gameplay

What next :
- Update instrument song
- Accumulation total score
- High score
- Connect with facebook and google+
- Rank system
- Share score to facebook, twitter and google+
